Description: Limestone ostracon. 12 lines of text on the recto and 4 lines on the verso containing a testimony of two witnesses named Johannes and Kame in front of a jury.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably on the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (83-87, pl. 3)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82868) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82868)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 2 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
